text: When Dwayne Johnson comes and asks you to deliver his baby, how do you say no? The Rampage star was chatting with Jimmy Kimmel about the upcoming birth of his second child with longtime girlfriend Lauren Hashian when Johnson mentioned he ’ s gon na need a doula. “ Well, it ’ s got ta be you, ” he told Kimmel, who obliged. “ I would love to be the doula, ” he said. “ Can I be honest with you? I ’ d be more than happy to fill in for yah. I will wear one of your outfits, the whole thing. I ’ ll get in there, I ’ ll scrub real good — I know how to wash my hands really, really well. ” The one thing Kimmel won ’ t do, though, is cut the um
